The salary of a Javascript Developer in India varies based on experience, location, company & Industry. 
      The average salary for a Javascript Developer is ₹6.1 Lakhs per year (₹50.7k per month) . Top companies and specialized roles may offer higher compensation. The average starting salary is around 
      ₹6.1 Lakhs  per year, with the highest salary reaching ₹6.7 Lakhs  per year. The top 10% of Javascript Developers in India earn more than ₹11 Lakhs per year, and the top 1% earn over ₹25 Lakhs per year. Salary estimates are based on 939 salaries received from various Javascript Developers across industries. How does experience affect salaries of a Javascript Developer in India? Experience significantly impacts a Javascript Developer salary in India. Salaries increase with experience, as Javascript Developer take on more complex tasks, responsibilities, and leadership roles.
            Javascript Developer salary at different experience level are as follows: Experience Average Annual Salary 0 - 1 yr ₹3.6 Lakhs per year 1 - 3 yrs ₹4.5 Lakhs per year 3 - 6 yrs ₹8 Lakhs per year 6 - 9 yrs ₹12.2 Lakhs per year and so on.
